name: Does this spark Joy?
description:
This is the game I've made in global gamejam 2019. So it's totally not refined in any way.

This game is about asking yourself what sparks joy for you. It wasn't supposed to be too hedonistic, but at this point it is.

It was made in mindspace after binge watching Tidying Up with Marie Kondo.

Moreover, #CareGame, #TrashGame
